My Favourite Games

Just a small list of some of my favourite games i own

The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword HD

An HD remaster of the classic Zelda game, featuring enhanced graphics and motion controls.

Year: 2021

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario Odyssey

A 3D Mario platformer with vast open worlds, new power-ups, and Cappy, Mario's new hat companion.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Super Mario Bros Wonder

A new 2D Mario platformer with wonder effects that change the world in exciting ways.

Year: 2023

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Pokemon Legends: Arceus

An open-world Pokémon game set in ancient times, where players catch and battle wild Pokémon.

Year: 2022

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Luigi's Mansion 3

Luigi explores a haunted hotel, using his trusty Poltergust to solve puzzles and catch ghosts.

Year: 2019

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom

A direct sequel to Breath of the Wild, with new powers, locations, and epic battles.

Year: 2023

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Paper Mario: The Thousand Year Door

A remake of the beloved Paper Mario RPG with turn-based combat and a quirky story.

Year: 2024

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

An open-world Zelda game with a huge world to explore, filled with puzzles and epic battles.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Hyrule Warriors Deluxe

A remastered version of the original Hyrule Warriors game with additional content and characters.

Year: 2014

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

Mario Kart 8 Deluxe

The ultimate version of the hit kart racing game with new tracks, characters, and online play.

Year: 2017

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Switch

The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD

An HD remaster of the acclaimed Zelda game, featuring enhanced graphics and improved gameplay.

Year: 2016

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD

An HD remaster of the classic Zelda game, featuring updated graphics and gameplay improvements.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Nintendo

Console: Wii U

LEGO Marvel Super Heroes

An action-adventure game featuring LEGO versions of Marvel superheroes in a new story.

Year: 2013

Publisher: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment

Console: Wii U
